name: Neon Survivors
description:
ANNIHILATE a small army's worth of ghouls, knaves and miners, with the power of lasers, missiles and kidneys!



UPGRADE your power infinitely: Every upgrade you can find, can be stacked as many times as you please, allowing you to claim some sort of level 45 Laser Beam That Covers The Whole Screen, if you have the luck for it!



SELECT from a handful of different characters, each with their own playstyles! The aggressive OLIVE shall run headlong into hordes of enemies to claim blessed orbs, while the industrious GLORIA shall construct an impenetrable fortress that grinds any adversaries to dust! And Jerry is there too, he doesn't do anything special though.
